word:
I have seen that the entire family were in danger of partaking, in a degree, of the father's spirit. Sr. Rumery, you have already partaken of this spirit. God help you to see it, and make an entire change. Cultivate a love of doing good. Seek to be rich in good works. You can do, in many things, more than you do. You have  an individual responsibility before God. You have a duty to do, from 
                                                                           40
which you cannot be excused. Maintain a close walk with God. Pray without ceasing. You will have close work if you save your soul.
